activities.name: exercise
activities.description: Physical activity like walking, running, or gym

activities.name: social_connection
activities.description: Call or meet with a friend

activities.name: reading
activities.description: Read a book or inspiring content

activities.name: creative_hobby
activities.description: Art, music, crafting, or other creative pursuits

suggestions.title: 4-7-8 Breathing Exercise
suggestions.content: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat 4 times. This technique is proven to reduce anxiety.

suggestions.title: 5 Senses Grounding
suggestions.content: Name 5 things you see, 4 you touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste. This anchors you to the present moment.

suggestions.title: You Are Strong
suggestions.content: I am capable of handling whatever comes my way. I have overcome challenges before and I can do it again.

suggestions.title: Box Breathing
suggestions.content: Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4. Repeat for 2 minutes. Great for calming panic.

suggestions.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
suggestions.content: Tense and release each muscle group from toes to head. Helps release physical tension from stress.

suggestions.title: I Am Resilient
suggestions.content: This feeling is temporary. I am strong and I will get through this. I have resources and strength within me.

suggestions.title: Body Scan Meditation
suggestions.content: Starting at your head, mentally scan down your body, noticing and relaxing tension. Brings awareness to stress patterns.

suggestions.title: Loving-Kindness Meditation
suggestions.content: Send compassion to yourself and others through gentle meditation. Builds emotional resilience and connection.
